item.title: Home
item.description: Basic infomation My name is Shijian XU (Chinese: 徐世坚). I am currently a PhD student at University of Basel. I graduated from EPFL with a Master’s degree in Data Science. I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2018 from Nanjing University. CV Education 2024.04 – Current   University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland PhD student in Computer Science 2020.09 – 2023.02   EPFL, Lausanne, Switzerland Master of Science MSc in Data Science
